## HttpClient type

Convenience type compatible with both [HttpSetup](./kibana-plugin-core-public.httpsetup.md) and [HttpStart](./kibana-plugin-core-public.httpstart.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type HttpClient = Omit<HttpStart, 'anonymousPaths'>;
```
